name: Classic Sports Car Parking Game Real Driving Test Run Racing
name_original: Classic Sports Car Parking Game Real Driving Test Run Racing
description:
Cruise the Coastal Resort City in an exciting range of Modern and Classic Cabriolet Cars! Test your Parking Skills whilst feeling the wind in your hair at the beautiful beach resort.

_____________________________
CABRIOLET CONVERTIBLE CARS
Get behind the wheel of some gorgeous Drop-Top Cars, from 60’s Classics to current gen Super Sports Cars… there’s something for all tastes just waiting in your garage! Which will you drive today?

_____________________________
PARKING & PRECISION DRIVING
Dozens of missions including: Parking, Slaloms, Speed & Handling Tests, Ramps and Reversing! Whatever you do, don’t scratch the cars – they are particularly expensive to restore!

_____________________________
BEAUTIFUL SUNSET COAST
Experience the beauty of the Coastal town. Packed full of exciting Parking Challenges, all set to test your driving and parking skills.

_____________________________
FREE TO PLAY
The Main Game Mode is 100% FREE to Play, all the way through, no strings attached! Extra Game Modes that alter the rules slightly to make the game easier are available through In-App Purchases. Each mode has separate GameCenter leaderboards to make for totally fair online competition!


_____________________________
GAME FEATURES
▶ BEAUTIFUL CARS: 4 amazing Cabriolet Drop-Top Cars to drive
▶ EXCITING MISSIONS: including Parking, Slalom, Speed Runs, Handling Tests and Reversing!
▶ 100% Free-2-Play Missions
▶ CONTROLS: choose between Buttons, Wheel, Tilt & MFi Game Controller Support
▶ CAMERAS: multiple cameras including a First Person view
▶ OPTIMISED: runs on anything from (or better than) the iPhone 4, iPad 2, iPad Mini & iPod Touch (4th Generation)

-------------------------------------------------
From the creators of “The Best Parking Games on the App Store” (a comment given by many of our happy players!). See our other games for many more exciting Parking Simulator games!
